feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:11AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...VALDEZ GLACIER DAMMED LAKE RELEASING... Valdez Glacier Dammed Lake on the Valdez Glacier is releasing causing rises on the Valdez Glacier Lake and Stream. The Valdez Glacier Stream is currently at 20.3 ft and has risen over 3 ft since Monday morning. The event is mirroring the release a year ago and is expected to rise an additional 2-3 ft to around 22.5 ft

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued June 07 at 8:46AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...OZONE HIGH POLLUTION ADVISORY FOR PINAL COUNTY WEDNESDAY... The Pinal County Department of Air Quality has issued an Ozone High Pollution Advisory for Pinal County including Apache Junction, Casa Grande, Coolidge, and Florence on Wednesday. This means that forecast weather conditions combined with existing ozone levels are expected to result in local maximum 8-hour ozone

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:38AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Heating Up This Week, Then Increasing Winds This Weekend... * Summer`s first multi-day period of heat is projected Thursday through Saturday. Highs well into the 90s in Western Nevada and into the 80s for Sierra communities are expected, with potential for some records on Friday. There is a 20-30% chance of cities such as Reno and Fallon hitting 100 degrees on Friday. Heat
entry.cap:areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties; Mono; Surprise Valley California

entry.summary: ...RAIN AND SNOW MELT WILL RESULT IN RISES ON RIVERS AND SMALL STREAMS IN THE CASCADES LATE THIS WEEK INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... An atmospheric river arrives on Thursday into the weekend bringing periods of moderate rainfall and warm, windy conditions. Rain amount of 1 to 3 inches is possible along the Cascade crest. In addition melting of mid and high elevation snow will add to runoff

entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Weston and southern Crook Counties through NOON MDT...
